attributes.action: Get rid of planning permission for small scale domestic wind turbines.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With the increased threat of global warming and the suppossed actions of the govenment trying to cut carbons by 20% by 2020 is just not good enough. Why cant we the public put a small scale turbine in our garden to produce some of our electricity to try and cut carbons without having to wait 8 weeks and £130, then for someone to say yes or no to a small turbine in your own garden, cant they see we are trying to save the planet. Please sign the petition to make a difference.

Ryan Raymond

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
